backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, product catalog, Stripe configuration, and subscription data with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app with router setup, dark theme enforcement, and layout including Header, MainAnalyzer, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard UI for configuring Stripe keys with validation, status checks, and update actions.
frontend/src/components/AlertList.tsx: Displays detected triggers grouped by type using accordions, icons, and severity badges. Helps users inspect suspicious message patterns.
frontend/src/components/ApiKeyModal.tsx: Modal UI for viewing, validating, saving, or removing the Gemini API key. Provides real‑time validation and feedback through toasts.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat UI handling message input, Firebase initialization, local message loading, and Gemini API usage. Manages online state, session data, and shows the API key modal when needed.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback alert with reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer showing branding and a note about local-only text analysis unless cloud features are enabled.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with branding and a lock icon representing the secure enclave theme.
frontend/src/components/HistoryVault.tsx: Shows stored analysis history with timestamps, risk colors, and management actions like delete and clear-all, including haptic feedback.
frontend/src/components/MainAnalyzer.tsx: Main text analysis component managing input, scan limits, metrics, history, and UI panels. Uses debounced analysis, clipboard actions, and chat message aggregation.
frontend/src/components/MetricsPanel.tsx: Displays USP and PES metric values with color-coded progress and limited visibility for free users. Shows Pro‑gated features and basic metric alerts.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: UI screen for failed or cancelled payments with retry and return buttons. Shows a destructive alert explaining no charges occurred.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Handles payment verification, activates Pro access, and displays success or processing states. Provides continuation back to the app once complete.
frontend/src/components/ProAccessUpgrade: Subscription upgrade screen listing free and Pro plans, authentication, and Stripe checkout initiation. Manages login, logout, and plan selection with feature comparisons.
Shows conversation‑based USP/PES audit details with Pro‑gated resolution and metric summaries. Displays message history metrics and color‑coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/RiskMeter.tsx: Displays a risk score with dynamic color, icon, and progress bar, showing risk level and alerts based on thresholds.
frontend/src/components/SettingsPanel.ts: Provides application settings UI including analysis mode, history controls, authentication, subscriptions, and admin tools.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigurat: Interactive guide walking admins through multi‑step Stripe setup with progress tracking and completion handling.
frontend/src/contexts/AppContext.tsx: Holds global app state such as settings, history, API keys, subscription info, and daily scan limits with persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced value hook that delays updates by a specified timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth, loading persisted identities, handling login/logout, and exposing auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedState.ts: Custom hook that syncs React state to localStorage with safe serialization and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, products, Stripe config, and checkout sessions using an actor-based backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines theme variables, dark mode styles, fonts, and neon effects.
frontend/src/lib/analyzer.ts: Implements text analysis using pattern-based scam detection with homoglyph normalization and severity metadata.
frontend/src/lib/firebase.ts: Provides a placeholder offline-capable Firebase service for messages with config checks and local storage fallback.
frontend/src/lib/geminiService.ts: Implements a Gemini API client with API key management, validation, and message sending.
frontend/src/lib/metrics.ts: Calculates USP and PES scores from chat history using keyword frequency analysis.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash for routing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment variable types for Firebase and Gemini config values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, and feature requests related to rendering the public UI regardless of Stripe configuration.
